fields.label: Content Chunks
fields.name: chunks
fields.instructions: Chunks provide a structure for your content. Use these core modules to add content to the page and reorder it.

sub_fields.label: Heading
sub_fields.name: heading
sub_fields.instructions: A few words for a heading.

sub_fields.label: Text
sub_fields.name: text
sub_fields.instructions: The paragraph text for this section.

sub_fields.label: Item Heading
sub_fields.name: item_heading
sub_fields.instructions: Heading for list item. One to three words.

sub_fields.label: SVG File Name
sub_fields.name: svg
sub_fields.instructions: The name of the  SVG file, all lowercase, no spaces, and without the file extension.

sub_fields.label: Item Text
sub_fields.name: item_text
sub_fields.instructions: One to three sentences.

sub_fields.label: CSS Class
sub_fields.name: css_class
sub_fields.instructions: Custom CSS class. Add color classes here.

sub_fields.label: Column Type
sub_fields.name: column_type
sub_fields.instructions: Select column type

sub_fields.label: Above Title
sub_fields.name: above_title
sub_fields.instructions: This is the title above the main section heading.

sub_fields.label: Section Title
sub_fields.name: section_title
sub_fields.instructions: This is the title of the section.

sub_fields.label: CTA Text
sub_fields.name: cta_text
sub_fields.instructions: 140 Characters
sub_fields.default_value: We'll help you mange, plan, and invest your finances.

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: Upload the image for this block. If you would like a caption for the image, fill in the Caption field in the image editor.

sub_fields.label: Size
sub_fields.name: size
sub_fields.instructions: Large images will extend beyond the width of the text. Medium images are the size of the text. Small images are, surprise, smaller and centered.

sub_fields.label: Elements
sub_fields.name: elements
sub_fields.instructions: Elements will appear inline with the text. There should always be one or two text blocks between other elements. Images will extend slightly beyond the text width to the right or left.

sub_fields.label: Embed code
sub_fields.name: embed_code
sub_fields.instructions: Paste the embed code for a map or video, for example.

sub_fields.label: Quote
sub_fields.name: quote
sub_fields.instructions: The pull quote text.

sub_fields.label: Text
sub_fields.name: text
sub_fields.instructions: It is recommended to use only basic formatting, and to avoid headings.

sub_fields.label: List Type
sub_fields.name: list_type
sub_fields.instructions: Select the type of list you want.

sub_fields.label: List Display
sub_fields.name: list_display
sub_fields.instructions: Select the display of the list.

sub_fields.label: Text Alignment
sub_fields.name: text_alignment
sub_fields.instructions: Select the alignment of the list text.

sub_fields.label: Connected Items
sub_fields.name: items
sub_fields.instructions: Select the items to be linked to in this list. The items title will display. For a text list, the excerpt will be displayed and for an icon list the associated SVG will display.

sub_fields.label: HTML or Shortcode
sub_fields.name: html
sub_fields.instructions: Paste any HTML or Shortcodes here.

sub_fields.label: Size
sub_fields.name: size
sub_fields.instructions: Large images will extend beyond the width of the text. Medium images are the size of the text. Small images are, surprise, smaller and centered.
